upcoming: * Rewrite of async code around FutureTasks rather than custom garbage.

added: Supports the 'logging' property of version.jsons now

installNotes: Adds support for Mojang's Log4J exploit fix BUT DOES NOT AUTOMATICALLY DOWNLOAD THE FIX!!!
YOU MUST REINSTALL YOUR GAME VERSIONS TO MAKE USE OF THIS!!!
Also, STOP USING THIS LAUNCHER WTFWTF IT'S SO BAD
One of the reasons for my making version 3 of this launcher was to *prevent* automatically downloading game updates.
As bad of practice as that is, up until roughly 2 weeks ago it hasn't been an active, well known and serious threat.
At this point however, there's been over a year of stagnation in development, lots of inconsistencies between what this
launcher and the official launcher supports, inability to launch a Realms-compatible game instance somehow, bugs and missing
features left unattended, and now a massive exploit in Log4j, which this launcher has never properly supported logging from.
Eventually I'll get around to FullRewriteIV-TheFourth and release MCIGUIv4, but this has always been a personal project for
funzies. If you're still here, stop, get some help, switch to MultiMC or something.
This will likely be the last update until I scrap this version of MCIGUI and move on to the next.

changed: Versions with inherited info use proper main class now
Debug launch shows mcHome now

added: Support for versions with inherited launch args (OptiFine)
Hold Ctrl+Alt+Shift and click Play to print full launch args

changed: Fixed PMgr doing nothing when logging in with stored pass after decryption.
Increased the number of accounts visible in Play As dropdown from 8 to 20
Actually actually fixed unicode in passwords. It works. Tested.
Actually fixed auth error when using special characters in passwords.
Fixed auth error when using special characters in passwords.
Replaced debug code with authenticator
Made a certain momentary progress pop-up mildlyLessAnnoying.
Gave the Password Manager a reason for existing.
* Logging in through the login screen can use the password manager.
* Logging in by pressing Play or Install can use the password manager.
Removed some debug code that let the game launch with invalid sessions.
Show usernames checkbox is no longer disabled (ever).
Forget Password/Reload button now actually does a thing.

added: The infamous Password Manager from MCIGUIv2.
* Currently lacking responsive dialogs, expect a short freeze on slow machines.

changed: The launcher no longer reports an update when the update check failed.
The update check now runs daily.
Some game files not following Mojang's current standard (*cough* FORGE) work now.
Improved some error logging
Made scrolling some windows with the mouse wheel faster.
Includes changes from 3.0.3 and 3.0.4.
Version management migrated entirely to GitHub.
* Dropbox versions will remain but no longer be updated.
Fixed unnamed profiles (created by windows launcher) breaking on load.
Launcher window now shows full version in the title.
Location of launcher version manifest on GitHub fixed.
A null version will not say there is an update available (if update check fails).

added: Even MORE error logging, because things were borking but I couldn't hear them.
changed: Fixed compatibility with either Mojang's launcher or MCIGUIv2's user profile saving.
Fixed user login info not being displayed correctly
Fixed inheritsFrom not being loaded from version.json (OptiFine and more will work now)

added: Additional error logging so when everything's borked you'll know.
changed: Fixed compatibility with Mojang's java launcher's version.json files
*Their java launcher saves version.jsons differently from their website. K
Fixed Install versions button not working after logging in
Fixed a few optional options from being unoptionally required.

added: A new launcher... Initial release woo!
Probably does it better than Mojang!
Can be run from a flash drive, if you have a copy of Java 8 or higher.
Supports official launcher's profiles JSON. Because compatibility right? Right Mojang!?!? RIGHT MOJANG?!!?!?!?!?
Has a game output console for nerds.
Logs game output in a way that won't corrupt if 2+ games are running
Keeps past output consoles, just in case you actually cared about those for some weird reason
Automagically refreshes a user's access token if necessary when logging in/starting the game.
changed: Changed nothing. This is the first release.lol just testing the changelogs don't mind me.
removed: A bunch of fluff that you don't need for running Minecraft.

installNotes: This is the first release of MCIGUI version 3.
Future releases will have more features and compatibility with official Minecraft content.
